parameters.label: Bump Rate
parameters.infoText: How many beats there should be between each camera bump. Set to 0 to prevent the camera from bumping at all.

parameters.label: Bump Intensity (Main)
parameters.infoText: How much the game's main camera should zoom when it bumps. Set to 1 for the default intensity, or set to 0 to not change the intensity at all.

parameters.label: Bump Intensity (HUD)
parameters.infoText: How much the game's HUD camera should zoom when it bumps. Set to 1 for the default intensity, or set to 0 to not change the intensity at all.

parameters.label: Restart Sequence
parameters.infoText: If checked, this event's location marks the first beat in the camera bump sequence. Otherwise, the first beat will depend on the previous sequence.
